@AlynSmithMEP: There are many challenges ahead. But we are on it, in the European parliament, in Westminster, in Holyrood.
@AlynSmithMEP: Article 50 is like a fire extinguisher, you never want to use it. But I want to know that it works in case I need it.
@AlynSmithMEP: There are other ways of interacting with the EU. I don't think it's beyond the possibility of political good will to find it.
@AlynSmithMEP: History book will write about the Leave campaign.They targeted the people who are rightly angry and told them to blame the EU
